title: Aseoko cloth
description: predominately dark blue with a faint light blue checkered design; decorated with three long panels containing purple, blue, and grey stripes; textile consists of several long panels or strips stitched together; textile hemmed at shorter edges; the letter \"A\" is embroidered near the center, 10 1/2\" from shorter edge
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
